column2: Key Responsibilities: 1. Sales Leadership: Lead and manage the bancassurance sales team to achieve regional sales targets. Develop and implement sales strategies to drive growth in the region. Monitor and analyze sales performance, providing guidance and support to the team. 2. Business Development: Identify and develop new business opportunities within the bancassurance channel. Build and maintain strong relationships with bank partners and key stakeholders. Collaborate with bank partners to design and execute joint marketing campaigns and initiatives. 3. Operational Excellence: Ensure efficient and effective operations within the region. Oversee training and development programs for the sales team to enhance their skills and knowledge. Implement best practices and ensure compliance with company policies and regulatory requirements. 4. Customer Focus: Ensure high levels of customer satisfaction through excellent service delivery. Address customer queries and resolve issues in a timely manner. Continuously seek feedback to improve customer experience. 5. Reporting and Analysis: Prepare and present regular reports on sales performance, market trends, and other relevant metrics. Utilize data and insights to make informed business decisions.  Experience: 7 to 15 years in general insurance, with a strong focus on bancassurance channel sales.  Education: Bachelor's degree in Business, Finance, or a related field. An MBA or equivalent qualification will be an added advantage.SALES OF GEN INSURANCE PRODUCT VIA BANKASSURANCE WILL APPLY Skills:  Proven track record of achieving sales targets and driving business growth.  Excellent leadership and team management skills.  Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities.  Exceptional communication and interpersonal skills.  Ability to build and maintain relationships with key stakeholders.  Location: Candidates must be willing to be based in Karnal.
column11: general insurance, Sales Leadership, service delivery, Bancassurance, channel sales, customer queries, Business Development, sales

column2: India's Leading Insurance Company is seeking a highly motivated and results-oriented Bancassurance Manager to join our growing Banca Channel team. In this critical role, you will be responsible for developing strategic partnerships with branch relationship managers and bank staff to achieve ambitious sales targets for insurance products. Responsibilities: Build and maintain strong relationships with branch managers and other bank personnel within a designated territory. Identify and qualify potential insurance leads from the bank's customer base. Understand and effectively explain the features and benefits of various insurance products, including life insurance, health insurance, and other relevant offerings. Match client needs with suitable insurance solutions, ensuring clear communication of risks and benefits. Assist bank staff in the sales process, providing training and support for effective product promotion. Process insurance applications accurately and efficiently, ensuring adherence to company guidelines and regulatory requirements. Monitor and analyze sales performance, identifying areas for improvement and exceeding assigned sales targets. Contribute to the development and implementation of effective sales strategies within the branch network. Qualifications and Experience: Bachelor's degree in any discipline (preferred). Minimum 2 to 6 years of experience in sales and marketing in the BFSI domain. Strong understanding of life and/or health insurance products and their applications. Excellent communication, interpersonal, and presentation skills. Ability to build rapport and trust with diverse clientele and bank staff. Proven ability to achieve and exceed sales targets in a competitive environment. Excellent time management and organizational skills. For more information - Kindly Contact Us: Avanik P | HR Team Phone/WhatsApp: +91 82004 21048
